summary: Page 19 (book page לט) contains sections מא through מז. All section numbers are sequential and correct. Structure is clean with single makor paragraphs per section. Source refs are well captured. A few minor text issues with unusual words.

issues.description: The OCR reads 'הכל נוחים וממוצלח, וזו מנחתי גמליכם'. The word 'וממוצלח' appears odd (extra מ prefix). Also 'מנחתי גמליכם' is unclear - may be a different reading.
issues.original_text: הכל נוחים וממוצלח, וזו מנחתי גמליכם

issues.description: The OCR reads 'כעזר מקולע וסייעתא דשמיא'. The word 'מקולע' seems unusual in this context of Torah study rewards.
Source ref reads 'מעגלי צדק פ' בחוקותי'. Looking at the image this appears correct.
The OCR includes a complete and reasonable makor text about שכר שמיעה. The source ref 'דבש לפי מערכת מ"ם' appears correct.
